title: What is the role of technology to improve third party logistics services? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I started my career in TCI as a data entry operator, always there was 1 day delay in entering data pertaining to booking and despatch of the shipment. Not only that next connection will take another week. In 1989–90, IT was only to capture the data and computers were available in cream of the corporates. Now every small time lorry owner owning the system and tracking his vehicle. Any damage/missing -data gathering and submitting to legal, it took month. Now all in the finger touch and flash of time. Technology minimized the data entry and all milestones are visible to the end customer now from order processing to Delivery…every activities are transparent. No staff at third party logistics murmuring of entries as on line data processed and posted through API from big customers. Mobile phone captures all data at the customer premises. All are now in REAL TIME. Any delay in the logistics process is intolerable by the end user…This itself is a big Win by the Technology to users. Shipment,Vehicle, Bikers and Customer experience - all are well knitted by Technology in Third party logistics.

Talking about the logistics business, technology has proved its efficiency and usefulness by providing customer transparency.One of the leading companies famous for providing transparency to its customers in the logistic business is Shipsy. Shipsy is the leading and the most trusted amongst all the companies in the market because it provides customer transparency by taking efficient use of technology. Shipsy offers unique features to its customers using a logistic management system that stands out because a) customers can easily track their order b) automatic route optimization service provided to the customer c) digitized proof of delivery d) 100% customer satisfaction e) real-time visibility through tracking system f) rescheduling of delivery according to customers need and availability. Shipsy has bagged the highest number of downloads on the Google Play Store app proving its authenticity.
